summary: The 'Preventing Illegal Weapons Trafficking Act of 2025' aims to address the importation and proliferation of machinegun conversion devices. It mandates a strategy by the Attorney General, Secretary of Homeland Security, and Secretary of the Treasury to prevent trafficking, including enhancing detection, inter-agency coordination, and data collection. The bill also includes provisions for forfeiture of proceeds from illegal machine gun trafficking and requires the Attorney General to include information about machinegun conversion devices in the annual firearms trafficking report.
